> **PR title format:** `<type>(optional-scope): description`
>
> | Type | Release | Example |
> |------|---------|---------|
> | `feat:` | minor (x.Y.z) | `feat(scanner): add TF-IDF clustering` |
> | `fix:` | patch (x.y.Z) | `fix(nexus): handle 429 rate limiting` |
> | `feat!:` | major (X.y.z) | `feat!: redesign mod correlation engine` |
> | `chore/ci/docs/refactor/test/style/build/perf/revert` | no release | `ci: add PR title validation` |
